posts.postText:
can some one define trolling and give me three examples.

i want converstations that took place foreal or screenies.

Trolling: Being a prick, just because you can.


1. Delete system32, it makes your computer go faster.
2. The game
3. lol how do magnets werk????

Definition - Angering or Annoying others for your own amusement.

1 - How do I stop the wobble?  F10 + Enter
2 - "That Guy, you alive?" No answer "That GUY!!!!" Still no answer "Ok kill *insert name here* he was with him last" "But wait, I didn't--" <Random Guy has found the corpse of *Insert name here* He was Innocent.> "But wait, didn't he kill That Guy" Me- "Hmm, what?  Oh Sorry I was AFK *lie*" (I actually did this once XD)
3 - "What does this do?" "Thats a Traitor tester, go in" "Ok" BOOM!!!! *Takes screenshot and leaves*

I can give you live examples if you want.

1. Bewmshaka
2. Pharaoh
3. Gash
